column3: Right, time to put these godly─an' now aether-infused─hands to work!
Heh, I'll never tire of admirin' me handiwork. A multi-aspected phantasm o' highly concentrated aether, in perfect harmony with the very essence o' the weapon...
Behold the true potential of aetheric bleedin' infusion: <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/>!
Behold the true potential of aetheric bleedin' infusion: <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> an' <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(2),1,1)/>!
Feels good in the hand, doesn't it? Well worth the drudgery an' staggerin' financial cost, I'd wager.
Yer probably sick to death o' scrappin' after that nonsense with the aetherwells, but don't let me catch ye with that weapon languishin' in yer pack─get out there an' test its potential!
